text: Blood on the Land (, translit. To Homa vaftike kokkino) is a 1966 Greek western drama movie directed by Vasilis Georgiadis and starring Nikos Kourkoulos, Mary Chronopoulou, Giannis Voglis, Faidon Georgitsis, Notis Peryalis. It was nominated for an Academy Award in 1967. ==Other websites== * Category:1966 drama movies Category:1960s Western (genre) movies Category:Greek movies Category:Movies directed by Vasilis Georgiadis
title: Blood on the Land
